hudson.tasks.Shell.command: # create jenkins ssh keys if [ ! -e ~jenkins/.ssh ]; then mkdir ~jenkins/.ssh; fi cd ~jenkins/.ssh/ if [ ! -e ~jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa.pub ]; then ssh-keygen -C "jenkins" -f ~jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa -P ""; fi chown -R jenkins ~jenkins/.ssh/ chmod 700 ~jenkins/.ssh chmod 600 ~jenkins/.ssh/*

# create user jenkins in LAB-VM02 via SSH sshpass -p 'simplepassword' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@10.175.5.170 <<'ENDSSH' adduser jenkins gpasswd -a jenkins wheel echo "jenkinspassword" | passwd --stdin jenkins ENDSSH
# copy jenkins ssh key to LAB-VM02 sshpass -p "jenkinspassword" ssh-copy-id -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jenkins@10.175.5.170

# configurate LAB-VM02 via SSH sshpass -p 'simplepassword' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@10.175.5.170 <<'ENDSSH' yum update -y yum install epel-release -y yum install htop tmux jq -y sudo sed -i "s/.*PermitRootLogin.*/PermitRootLogin no/g" /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo sed -i "s/.*PasswordAuthentication.*/PasswordAuthentication no/g" /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo systemctl restart sshd ENDSSH
# check ssh with key sshpass ssh -i ~jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa jenkins@10.175.5.170 <<'ENDSSH' echo connected to host: hostname ENDSSH
